name: CrumbleTumble
description: Crumble Tumble is a puzzle game. You have to cross an archipelago composed of several islands to reach the finish line. The particularity is that all the movements are defined by the player in advance. To do this, the player can anticipate the behavior of the enemies and collect various magical objects on his way. Beware! the islands collapse under the weight of your character. Once you think you have defined the right path, your fate is sealed.
